housing.title: Are you moving from individually housing calves over 7 days old to pair or group housing?

calf-group-size.title: What will be the average group size for calves over 7 days old?

moisture-control.title: How will your building control moisture?

answers.moisture-control-A1: A drain or drainage channel inside the pen
answers.moisture-control-A2: Positioning drinking areas near drainage and away from bedding
answers.moisture-control-A3: A separate preparation or washing area

permanent-sick-pen.title: What type of sick pen will your building have?

answers.permanent-sick-pen-A3: A permanent heat source (for example heat lamps)

environmental-impact.title: How will the building minimise environmental impact?

answers.environmental-impact-A1: Solar PV panels on the roof of the building

sustainable-materials.title: Will your building use sustainable materials?

answers.sustainable-materials-A5: Reused or secondhand materials from elsewhere
